solution_line_template: There are {num_levels} levels * {spots_per_level} spots = <<{num_levels}*{spots_per_level}={total_spots}>>{total_spots} possible parking spots.
The second level has {open_first} open spots + {open_second_more} = <<{open_first}+{open_second_more}={open_second}>>{open_second} open spots.
The third level has {open_second} open spots + {open_third_more} = <<{open_second}+{open_third_more}={open_third}>>{open_third} open spots.
Total open spots are {open_first} + {open_second} + {open_third} + {open_fourth} = <<{open_first}+{open_second}+{open_third}+{open_fourth}={total_open}>>{total_open} open spots.
If there are {total_spots} possible spots – {total_open} open spots = <<{total_spots}-{total_open}={full_spots}>>{full_spots} full spots.
